titleStmt.title: Logos peru logou, or, The word written concerning the Word everliving viz. as touching his glorious kingly office on earth to come : witnessing that Jesus Christ shall have a visible glorious kingdome in the world ... / by William Sherwin ...
titleStmt.author: Sherwin, William, 1607-1687?

notesStmt.note: First three words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
